Introduction
This topic contains information on requests from VA to other agencies, including requests to the
Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP)
Internal Revenue Service (IRS)
, and
U.S. Public Health Service (USPHS)
.
title: M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section C - Information Requests to Other Federal Agencies
citation: Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section C
